name: Music Generator - ElevenLabs
description:
Generates music using the ElevenLabs Music API.
Supports both music creation and music modification.

Music creation: generates a new music according to the user's query, in a prompt-only mode.

Music modification: generates a music similar to the input music but with modifications according the user's query, using a composition plan.

Requires a valid ElevenLabs API key with credits.
Queries should respect ElevenLabs policies and terms of services.
author: @@official.shinkai

audio_llm_provider.description: Multi-modal LLM to use when input audio is provided. It must support audio processing. e.g, gemini_2_5_pro

elevenlabs_api_key.description: API key for ElevenLabs Music API

llm_provider.description: LLM to use when no input music is provided. Optional. Defaults to the LLM used in the session.

max_composition_plan_retries.description: Max times to retry LLM composition plan generation if invalid (default: 1), when modifying a prodived input music.

model_id.description: Model ID for ElevenLabs Music API (default: music_v1).

output_format.description: Specifies the output format, structured as 'codec_sample_rate_bitrate'. Defaults to 'mp3_44100_128'. For example, an MP3 at 22.05kHz/32kbps is 'mp3_22050_32'. IMPORTANT: Higher quality formats are tied to Elevenabs subscription tiers. - MP3 at 192kbps ('mp3_44100_192') requires a Creator tier or higher. - PCM at 44.1kHz ('pcm_44100') requires a Pro tier or higher.

user_query.description: User's music generation instructions or prompt. Describe either how you want to modify the existing music provided in input, or the new music you want to generate.

input_music.description: Local file path or URL (YouTube) to an audio/musical reference. Optional, used for music modification. Leave empty for new music creation.

music_length_ms.description: Desired music length in milliseconds (must be between 10000 and 300000 if specified). Optional: the tool or the ElevenLabs API can automatically choose a suitable music length.

composition_plan.description: JSON object with the composition plan, if generated

error_message.description: Error message if generation or saving failed

output_file_path.description: Path to saved audio file if generation succeeded
